text: Ara ‘amara allahara rasula mara'iyama tanaya ‘isa masihake hatya karechi’ tadera e uktira jan'ya. Athaca tara take hatya kareni ebam krusabid'dha'o kareni; baram tadera jan'ya (eka lokake) tara sadrsa kara hayechila [1]. Ara niscaya yara tara sambandhe matabheda karechila, tara abasya'i e sambandhe sansayayukta chila; e samparke anumanera anusarana chara tadera kono jnana'i chila na. Ara eta niscita ye, tara tamke hatya kareni
